abstract: For this week's magazine, Dan Kois has written a lovely profile of Lynda Barry: alternative cartoonist, frequent "Late Show With David Letterman" guest, writing-workshop leader and renegade creativity guru. If you're unfamiliar with Barry's work, take a quick visit to her tumblr, the almost excrutiatingly charming The Near-Sighted Monkey.
